channel.title: Hello world
channel.description: A sample blog made with jekyll, for a GCI task.

item.title: Introduction
item.description:
Hello, I’m Kai En.

I’m a 14-year-old Secondary student, participating in Google Code-In 2015. I play the drum kit.

Over the course of GCI, I’ve worked with FOSSASIA, a non-profit organisation dedicated to supporting developers of Free and Open Source technologies.

With them, I have learnt many things about open source development, including how to collaborate with others on Github.

The FOSSASIA community is very helpful and friendly.
